entries.journal_entry_description: Another attempt to show Benjamin, the Disillusioned Ewok Festival of love Sage, that love still exists even in a galaxy at war.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Mr. Love has another idea that might convince Benjamin, the Disillusioned Ewok Festival of Love Sage, that love still has power in a war-torn galaxy.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Find a way to  express some love to Mister Hate. If he responds then you will have proven that Love is still a force of great power in the galaxy. You can get Mister Hate to show himself by tapping the code Mr. Love showed you on a barrel behind the cantina or behind one of the hotels.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Express Some Love to Mister Hate
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Speak with Mister Hate and find out what he has to say.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Return to the Disillusioned Ewok Festival of Love Sage and relate to him the saga of Mister Hate.
entries.task04_waypoint_name: The Disillusioned Festival of Love Sage
entries.task06_comm_message_text: You've managed to rid Mister Hate of his hatred simply by showing him some love. What more could Benjamin ask?
entries.task07_start_message: You fire a single crossbow bolt into the air.
entries.task08_start_message: You tap the code Mr. Love showed you.
entries.task09_comm_message_text: I have another idea. It's of a bit more personal nature. Please come speak with me.
